statements: DELETE FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE policy_id = 101 AND policy_status = 'draft';
DELETE FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE media_organization = 'ABC News' AND implementation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_data WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM employee_data WHERE position = 'Manager' AND diversity_training_completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE company_name = 'ACME Inc.' AND policy_approval_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM policy_changes WHERE change_date > '2021-06-30' AND policy_id = 3;
DELETE FROM InclusionInitiatives WHERE company_id = 2 AND initiative_id = 3;
DELETE FROM CastMembers WHERE role = 'Lead Actor';
